phrs.translation: 轻率, 率性, 轻浮, 多变

sentences.sentence: At the time, Arnold had disapproved of such levity.
sentences.translation: 那时候，阿诺德不赞成如此的轻浮行为。

sentences.sentence: When he finished with a final birdie, any seriousness of the incident gave way to levity.
sentences.translation: 当他以一杆小鸟球结束最后一轮时，那丝严肃的气氛也烟消云散。

sentences.sentence: I am sure foreigners must think our levity is baffling.
sentences.translation: 外国人肯定认为我们的轻浮举止不可理喻。
